Casper.Eastridge Mall (Casper):
Eastridge Mall is a single level enclosed shopping mall located in Casper, Wyoming at the city's busiest intersection, east Second Street and southeast Wyoming Boulevard. It is one of only three shopping malls in the entire state.
Opened in 1982, the 570,000 square foot mall is the largest in the State of Wyoming, boasting over 90 shops, as well as a food court.
